channel.title: [Delta]How do I access the music tab?
channel.description:
When I click on it nothing happens. I would like to turn my music tab into a achievement spot, but first I need to get it working. I'm pretty sure my problem is in the client sides according to this guide [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=555444.0]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=555444.0[/url], but thats for pi.
I would really like this feature to get working...Thanks for your help
